tools.name: Genmo
tools.description: Genmo is a frontier AI lab offering open-source video generation models to create high-quality videos from text prompts.

tools.name: Move AI
tools.description: Move AI is a cutting-edge platform that leverages artificial intelligence for markerless motion capture, enabling creators to convert video footage into high-quality 3D animations without specialized hardware.

tools.name: Genie 3 World
tools.description: Genie 3 World offers a revolutionary platform for creating and interacting with immersive 3D virtual environments using text prompts, powered by DeepMind's advanced world model technology.
